TYPES.HELPER: The "List Type" field defines whether you want a simple list, containing only the product name, or a shopping cart, containing the quantity and value
TYPES.HELPER_END: You can convert your List into a Cart later, but you can NOT convert a Cart into a List

VALIDATION.HELPER_NAME: Type a nice name for your List
VALIDATION.HELPER_TARGET: Define a target value for this list
VALIDATION.NAME: List Name is required
